meanings.definition: A person who studies living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Biologists observe animals in their natural habitats.
meanings.sent2: Many biologists work in laboratories to conduct experiments.
meanings.sent3: The biologists at the zoo had a tough time counting all the monkeys.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, biologists are like detectives uncovering nature's secrets.
meanings.sent5: The group of biologists discovered a new species of butterfly in the rainforest.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the scientific study of life.
meanings.sent1: Biologists use microscopes to study tiny organisms.
meanings.sent2: The biologists presented their research findings at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The biologists had a picnic to celebrate their successful field trip.
meanings.sent4: In the classroom, biologists are like explorers discovering the mysteries of life.
meanings.sent5: The team of biologists published a groundbreaking paper on genetics.
